Name: Alchemania
About the game: Alchemania is a pixel arcade platformer with a side view. In an ancient Gothic castle lives an obsessive alchemist who lost his alchemical ingredients. The player will have to help a sloppy alchemist collect all his bottles. This is a reaction game: by pressing the mouse button you make the character jump, you need to jump in time to overcome obstacles and collect flasks/gems. After all items are collected a shadow portal to the next level will appear. Game Features: Interesting game mechanics Many challenging levels Steam achievements Nice pixel-art
